titles: A paper to Friends, and others, against the pomps of the world, followed and used by many tradesmen in their vocations, contrary unto many of their suerties [sic] promises and vows.
author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
notes: Signed: London, the 2d. of the 11th month, 1682. G.F. [i.e. George Fox].
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
keywords: Society of Friends --  England --  Pastoral letters and charges --  Early works to 1800.
